welcome_message_body: Welcome to Aba, China! Get ready to be charmed by our beautiful city known for its stunning natural scenery and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Aba has to offer.

restaurants.name: རྔ་བ་ཟས་རིགས་གཡོ་སྐོལ་ཚང་།·清雅老炒人家（阿坝店）
restaurants.description: རྔ་བ་ཟས་རིགས་གཡོ་སྐོལ་ཚང་།·清雅老炒人家（阿坝店） is a halal restaurant located in 阿坝藏族羌族自治州.
restaurants.address: 阿坝县德雀路45号, 阿坝藏族羌族自治州, 四川

restaurants.name: 清真老字号阿伊莎鲜牛杂
restaurants.description: 清真老字号阿伊莎鲜牛杂 is a chinese restaurant located in 阿坝藏族羌族自治州.
restaurants.address: 阿坝藏族羌族自治州, 四川

restaurants.name: 牦牛道涮烤一体牛排火锅
restaurants.description: 牦牛道涮烤一体牛排火锅 is a hotpot restaurant located in 阿坝藏族羌族自治州.
restaurants.address: 阿坝藏族羌族自治州, 四川

restaurants.name: 云丽红火塘腊排骨店
restaurants.description: 云丽红火塘腊排骨店 is a yunnan restaurant located in 阿坝.

restaurants.description: 味之源川菜馆 is a szechuan restaurant located in 阿坝.
